Master Answer:
The flu vaccine can be given anytime before, during or after the Hepatitis A vaccine. Flu vaccines cause antibodies to develop in the body about two weeks after vaccination. You may want to take this into consideration when making your decision. If you have other questions, please contact your immunization provider.
Immunization Nurse
